WW_II.description: A World War II film wins best picture ("Darkest Hour" or "Dunkirk").

WRONG_WINNER.description: The wrong winner is announced (in any category).

VARDA.description: Agnes Varda wins her first Oscar for "Faces Places" (at the ripe old age of 89).

SAME_SOUND.description: The same film wins for sound editing and sound mixing.

MONKEY.description: A monkey movie wins best visual effects ("Planet of the Apes" or "Kong").

538.description: FiveThirtyEight correctly guesses best picture, actor, actress, and director (http://53eig.ht/2CLN2gU).

BOSS_BABY.description: "The Boss Baby" wins a fucking Oscar.

PEELE.description: Jordan Peele wins for his directorial debut (screenplay, directing, or picture).

GERWIG.description: Greta Gerwig wins for her directorial debut (directing or picture).

FINAL_CURTAIN.description: Daniel Day-Lewis wins for his final performance.
